item.title: Google 推出「Nano Banana Pro」，图像生成进入推理时代
item.guid: Google-推出「Nano-Banana-Pro」，图像生成进入推理时代
item.description:
Yesterday, Google officially launched the preview version of Nano Banana Pro (officially named Gemini 3 Pro Image) on the Vertex AI platform. This new generation image generation model is positioned as an "inference model", which performs internal inference before generating images, thereby significantly improving image quality, factual accuracy, and the ability to render long texts in multiple languages. 昨天，Google 在 Vertex AI 平台正式上线 Nano Banana Pro（官方名为 Gemini 3 Pro Image）预览版。这款新一代图像生成模型被定位为「推理模型」，在生成图像前会进行内部推理，从而显著提升图像质量、事实准确性以及多语言长文本的渲染能力。

Gemini 3 Pro Image supports up to 64K input tokens and 32K output tokens, with a resolution of up to 4K. It also features multi-turn conversational editing, multi-image synthesis (up to 14 input images synthesized into 1 output image), and other functions. At the same time, the model integrates Google search capabilities to provide more accurate and up-to-date knowledge support for image generation. Gemini 3 Pro Image 支持最高 64K 输入 token 与 32K 输出 token，分辨率可达 4K，并具备多轮次对话式编辑、多图像合成（最多 14 张输入图像合成 1 张输出图像）等功能。同时，该模型集成了 Google 搜索能力，为图像生成提供更精确、最新的知识支持。

The official introduction points out that Gemini 3 Pro Image is particularly suitable for complex multi-turn image generation and editing, creative work requiring high factual accuracy, long text rendering in multilingual environments, and image creation scenarios that rely on the latest knowledge. 官方介绍指出，Gemini 3 Pro Image 特别适用于复杂的多轮次图像生成与编辑、需要高事实准确性的创意工作、多语言环境下的长文本渲染，以及依赖最新知识的图像创作场景。

In addition to being available in Vertex AI Studio, developers can also call this model through Google's Gen AI SDK in Python and Go environments, further expanding its application scenarios. 除在 Vertex AI Studio 中可用外，开发者还能通过 Google 的 Gen AI SDK 在 Python 与 Go 环境下调用该模型，应用场景得到进一步扩展。

PixVerse (Paiwo AI) under Aishi Technology has also officially integrated Nano Banana Pro, further enriching the workflow experience from image generation to video creation. Users can now upload multiple images via PixVerse.ai and pai.video to experience high-definition image generation and achieve a smoother creative process within the platform. 爱诗科技旗下 PixVerse（拍我 AI）也已正式接入 Nano Banana Pro，进一步丰富了从图像生成到视频创作的工作流体验。用户现可通过 PixVerse.ai 与 pai.video 上传多张图片，体验高清图片生成，并在平台内实现更流畅的创作流程。

item.title: 俞敏洪：南极游费用 20-25 万，鼓励员工吐槽自己
item.guid: 俞敏洪：南极游费用-20-25-万，鼓励员工吐槽自己
item.description:
Yesterday, Yu Minhong, founder of New Oriental, once again posted multiple Antarctic videos and responded to the public controversy sparked by his Antarctic trip. 昨天，新东方创始人俞敏洪再发多条南极视频，并发文回应其南极旅行引发的舆论争议。

He emphasized that the "Shagou" ice-breaking cruise ship he and photographer Xi Zhinong took was for 12 days, costing between 200,000 and 250,000 yuan, not the 1.48 million yuan rumored by the outside world. 他强调，自己与摄影师奚志农乘坐的「夏古号」破冰级邮轮为期 12 天，费用在 20-25 万元之间，并非外界传言的 148 万元。

Yu Minhong stated that allowing employees to complain is a tradition at New Oriental, and the company will promptly correct any issues. He also mentioned that voices impersonating New Oriental employees have appeared online, urging the public to exercise rational judgment. 俞敏洪表示，允许员工吐槽是新东方的传统，公司若存在问题会及时纠正。他还提到，网络上出现冒充新东方员工的声音，呼吁公众理性辨别。

In addition, he announced plans to fund approximately 10 outstanding grassroots employees from New Oriental and Oriental Selection, as well as 10 excellent Oriental Selection members, to travel to Antarctica for an expedition this winter, as an incentive and a form of gratitude. 此外，他宣布计划在今年冬天资助约 10 名新东方及东方甄选的基层优秀员工，以及 10 名东方甄选优秀会员前往南极考察，以此作为激励与回馈。

Previously, Yu Minhong sent an internal letter to employees during his Antarctic expedition, which sparked complaints from some employees who felt they 'couldn't empathize,' and the topic trended on Weibo. Subsequently, he continuously posted 10 Antarctic-related videos on social media, including footage of glaciers, animals, and ships, further fueling discussion. 此前，俞敏洪在南极考察期间向员工发布内部信，引发部分员工「无法共情」的吐槽，相关话题登上微博热搜。随后，他在社交平台连续发布 10 条南极相关视频，包括冰川、动物与船舶画面，进一步引发讨论。

item.title: 小米汽车第 50 万辆下线，刷新全球最快纪录
item.guid: 小米汽车第-50-万辆下线，刷新全球最快纪录
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi Auto announced on social media that its 500,000th vehicle officially rolled off the production line at its super factory in Beijing Yizhuang, taking only 602 days, less than 20 months, setting a new fastest record for global new energy vehicle manufacturers. 昨天，小米汽车在社交平台发文宣布，第 50 万辆整车在北京亦庄超级工厂正式下线，仅用 602 天、不足 20 个月，刷新全球新能源车企最快纪录。

Lei Jun, founder, chairman, and CEO of Xiaomi Group, stated that this milestone signifies the validation of Xiaomi Auto's systemic capabilities in R&D, manufacturing, sales, delivery, and service, and marks its entry into a new phase of scaled production. 小米集团创始人、董事长兼 CEO 雷军表示，这一里程碑标志着小米汽车在研发、制造、销售、交付和服务等方面的体系能力得到验证，并进入规模化新阶段。

Lei Jun also posted about this on his WeChat official account, emphasizing that 'safety is the foundation, safety is the prerequisite,' and revealed that Xiaomi Auto is expected to deliver over 400,000 vehicles for the full year of 2025. 雷军还就此事在微信公众号发文， 强调「安全是基础，安全是前提」 ，并透露小米汽车预计 2025 年全年交付量将超过 40 万辆。

In the past year, Xiaomi SU7 became the sales champion for sedans priced above 200,000, and the YU7 series SUV surpassed Model Y in October, topping the SUV sales chart in the Chinese market. 在过去一年中，小米 SU7 成为 20 万以上轿车销量冠军，YU7 系列 SUV 在 10 月份超越 Model Y，登顶中国市场 SUV 销量榜。

Meanwhile, Xiaomi Group's recently released Q3 financial report shows that Xiaomi Auto's Q3 deliveries exceeded 100,000 units, setting a new historical high, with smart electric vehicle revenue reaching 28.3 billion yuan, and achieving quarterly profitability for the first time. Lu Weibing, partner and president of Xiaomi Group, stated during the earnings call that the annual delivery target of 350,000 units is expected to be completed ahead of schedule this week. 而日前小米集团公布的 Q3 财报显示，小米汽车三季度交付量超过 10 万辆，创历史新高，智能电动汽车收入达 283 亿元，并首次实现单季度盈利。小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰在业绩电话会上指出，预计本周将提前完成全年 35 万辆交付目标。

On the same day, Lei Jun also announced on Weibo that to celebrate the 500,000th vehicle rolling off the production line, Xiaomi Auto will give away a total of 60,000 alloy car models, including 15,000 units at 1:43 scale and 45,000 units at 1:64 scale, which can be claimed through online interactions, at the Guangzhou Auto Show, and at event stores. 当天，雷军还在微博宣布，为庆祝第 50 万辆整车下线，小米汽车宣布将赠送共计 6 万个合金车模，其中包括 1:43 比例 1.5 万个和 1:64 比例 4.5 万个，可通过线上互动、广州车展现场及活动门店领取。

item.title: 苹果远程「变砖」泄密 M5 iPad Pro
item.guid: 苹果远程「变砖」泄密-M5-iPad-Pro
item.description:
According to Wccftech, after Russian YouTuber Wylsacom prematurely unboxed and leaked the M5 iPad Pro, Apple remotely 'bricked' the device, rendering it completely inoperable, only able to charge but not activate or use, effectively turning it into an 'expensive cutting board'. 据 Wccftech 报道，在俄罗斯 YouTuber Wylsacom 提前开箱泄密 M5 iPad Pro 后，苹果已将相关设备远程「变砖」，使其彻底失效，仅能充电，无法激活使用，形同「昂贵的菜板」。

The report pointed out that the Russian YouTuber demonstrated an approximately 30% GPU performance improvement of the M5 chip compared to the M4 chip in testing. However, this result was interpreted by some consumers as 'limited iteration,' leading them to choose to purchase the previous generation product. 报道指出，该俄罗斯 YouTuber 在测试中展示了 M5 芯片相较 M4 芯片约 30% 的 GPU 性能提升。然而，这一结果被部分消费者解读为「迭代有限」，从而选择购买上一代产品。

item.title: OpenAI 紧急推出 GPT-5.1 Pro，直击 Gemini 3
item.guid: OpenAI-紧急推出-GPT-5.1-Pro，直击-Gemini-3
item.description:
Yesterday, OpenAI posted on X, officially announcing the launch of GPT-5.1 Pro in just two sentences. The new model achieves breakthroughs in both performance and application scenarios and is seen as a direct response to Google Gemini 3. 昨天，OpenAI 在 X 发帖，仅以两句话官宣正式推出 GPT-5.1 Pro，新模型在性能与应用场景上均实现突破，被视为对 Google Gemini 3 的直接回应。

GPT-5.1 Pro has been further upgraded in both 'emotional intelligence' and 'intellectual intelligence' dimensions and is now available to all Pro users. GPT-5.1 Pro 在「情商」与「智商」双维度上进一步升级，现已面向所有 Pro 用户开放。

The official statement indicates that this version demonstrates clearer and more powerful reasoning and expression capabilities in complex tasks, especially excelling in writing assistance, data science, and business tasks. 官方表示，该版本在复杂任务中展现更清晰、更强大的推理与表达能力，尤其在写作辅助、数据科学与商业任务方面表现突出。

item.title: 微信 Mac/Windows 双端更新，支持滚动截图
item.guid: 微信-Mac/Windows-双端更新，支持滚动截图
item.description:
WeChat recently officially released version 4.1.5 updates for both Windows and Mac, bringing multiple practical feature upgrades. 微信近日正式发布 Windows、Mac 双端 4.1.5 版本更新，带来多项实用功能升级。

    The screenshot tool now includes a 'scrolling screenshot' option, allowing users to scroll down after taking a screenshot to generate a long image, improving operational efficiency;

    Chat files now have a 'Download to...' option, allowing users to save received files to a specified directory instead of the default path;

    The message forwarding interface now includes an emoji entry, allowing users to directly insert emojis and send them along with text in the comment box.

In addition, WeChat also launched the iOS 8.0.66 beta version yesterday, with no visible new features, but adjustments have been made to system compatibility: the installation threshold has been raised from the previous iOS 14 to iOS 15 and above, which may mean that future WeChat versions will no longer support iOS 14 and below. 此外，微信昨天还推出了 iOS 8.0.66 内测版，暂无可见新功能，但在系统兼容性上作出了调整：安装门槛从以往的 iOS 14，提高到了 iOS 15 及以上，或意味着未来的微信版本不再支持 iOS 14 及以下系统。

item.title: 网易 Q3 营收 284 亿元，《燕云十六声》引爆欧美市场
item.guid: 网易-Q3-营收-284-亿元，《燕云十六声》引爆欧美市场
item.description:
Yesterday, NetEase announced its Q3 2025 financial report, with revenue reaching 28.4 billion yuan and adjusted net profit of 9.5 billion yuan, maintaining steady year-on-year growth. 昨天，网易公布 2025 年第三季度财报，营收达 284 亿元，经调整后净利润为 95 亿元，同比保持稳健增长。

    Revenue from games and related value-added services was 23.3 billion yuan, an increase of 11.8% year-on-year, becoming the main driving force. Among them, the overseas version of 'Where Winds Meet' surpassed 2 million players within 24 hours of its launch and entered the top ten on Steam's bestseller charts in 20 European and American regions, with an 84% positive rating in English-speaking areas;

    Youdao and Cloud Music recorded revenues of 1.6 billion yuan and 2 billion yuan respectively. Among them, driven by the "AI-native" strategy, Youdao's cumulative operating profit in the first three quarters increased by nearly 150% year-on-year;

    R&D investment reached 4.5 billion yuan, accounting for approximately 16% of revenue.

In addition, NetEase's board of directors has approved a third-quarter dividend and announced the extension of its stock repurchase program of up to $5 billion until 2029. 此外，网易董事会已批准第三季度派息，并宣布延长最高 50 亿美元的股票回购计划至 2029 年。

item.title: 魅族科技大楼挂牌出售，官方回应
item.guid: 魅族科技大楼挂牌出售，官方回应
item.description:
The Meizu Technology Building, located at No. 2 Baisha Road, Tangjiawan, High-tech Zone, Zhuhai City, has been listed for sale at a total price of approximately 250 million yuan, with a unit price of 10,500 yuan per square meter, and a total area of 23,848.55 square meters. 位于珠海市高新区唐家湾白沙路 2 号的魅族科技大楼已挂牌出售，总价约 2.5 亿元，单价为每平方米 1.05 万元，整体面积达 23848.55 平方米。

The building was once a landmark for Meizu during its peak in the mobile phone market in 2017, but is now being sold due to strategic adjustments. 该大楼曾是魅族在 2017 年手机市场声量巅峰时期的标志性建筑，如今因战略调整而被出售。

In response, some netizens asked Meizu Technology's official Weibo account: "Are you moving to a new headquarters?" Meizu replied: "The lease for the Meizu Technology Building is still very long, and it will always be with everyone, pursuing what comes from passion." 对此，有网友询问魅族科技官微：要搬新总部吗？魅族方面则回复称：「魅族科技大楼租期还很长，会一直陪着大家，追求源于热爱。」

Meizu has gradually lost ground in its mobile phone business in recent years. After 2017, with the return of founder Huang Zhang and the discontinuation of the Meilan brand, offline channels shrank, and market share continued to decline. 魅族近年来在手机业务上逐渐失势。2017 年后，随着创始人黄章回归并砍掉魅蓝品牌，线下渠道缩减，市场份额持续下滑。

In July 2022, Geely acquired a 79.09% stake in Meizu through Xingji Times, achieving 100% control by the end of 2023, with Huang Zhang completely exiting. In March 2023, Xingji Meizu Group was established, headquartered in Wuhan, with Zhuhai becoming just one of its four office locations, no longer holding a core position. 2022 年 7 月，吉利通过星纪时代收购魅族 79.09% 股权，至 2023 年底实现 100% 控股，黄章彻底退出。2023 年 3 月，星纪魅族集团成立，总部设在武汉，珠海仅为四大办公地点之一，地位不再核心。

In March this year, it was reported that Xingji Meizu initiated organizational restructuring, with the entire marketing department relocating to Shenzhen for work, and employees who did not relocate had to choose to resign. Industry insiders pointed out that this move was because "Zhuhai cannot keep up with the general environment, and the company needs to find a new base, benchmarking against Shenzhen enterprises like DJI and Huawei." 今年 3 月有消息称，星纪魅族启动组织架构调整，市场部整体迁至深圳办公，未随迁员工需选择离职。业内人士指出，此举是因「珠海跟不上大环境，公司需要找个新的根据地，对标大疆、华为等深圳企业」。

Currently, Meizu's business focus has shifted towards deep collaboration with Geely Automobile in areas such as FlymeAuto and smart glasses, with a very low presence in the mobile phone business. In September, Meizu 22 was finally released after two delays, but it did not feature a flagship chip. 目前，魅族业务重心已转向 FlymeAuto、智能眼镜等与吉利汽车深度协同的方向，手机业务存在感极低，9 月，魅族 22 在跳票两次之后终于发布，但并未搭载旗舰芯片。

item.title: 飞书上线「应用模式」，表格秒变专业系统
item.guid: 飞书上线「应用模式」，表格秒变专业系统
item.description:
Yesterday, Feishu's new multi-dimensional table feature, "Application Mode," was fully launched. This feature supports quickly converting tables into business systems with clear logic and user-friendly interactions, and combines cutting-edge AI capabilities, allowing business personnel without an IT background to efficiently build professional systems. 昨天，飞书多维表格新功能「应用模式」全面上线。该功能支持将表格快速转换为逻辑清晰、交互友好的业务系统，并结合前沿 AI 能力，让非 IT 背景的业务人员也能高效搭建专业系统。

According to reports, "Application Mode" provides rich business components and enterprise-level permission control, supporting scenarios such as customer management, inventory management, and live broadcast operations. Compared to traditional custom development or procurement solutions, enterprises can shorten cycles and reduce costs while flexibly responding to business changes. 据介绍，「应用模式」提供丰富的业务组件与企业级权限管控，支持客户管理、库存管理、直播运营等场景。相比传统定制开发或采购方案，企业可在缩短周期与降低成本的同时，灵活应对业务变化。

In addition, Feishu's multi-dimensional table has deeply integrated AI into the entire process of business systems, offering features such as "AI-generated workflows," intelligent data analysis, and Q&A, helping enterprises achieve intelligent upgrades within a no-code framework. Its underlying architecture supports tens of millions of data entries per table and real-time collaboration for thousands of people, and it offers integration with over 1000 external systems, demonstrating stable, secure, and open ecosystem capabilities. 此外，飞书多维表格已将 AI 深度融入业务系统全流程，提供「AI 生成工作流」、智能数据分析与问答等功能，帮助企业在零代码体系下实现智能化升级。其底层架构支持单表千万级数据与千人实时协同，并开放超 1000 个外部系统集成，具备稳定、安全与开放的生态能力。

item.title: 蚂蚁集团全模态 AI 助手「灵光」三天冲上 App Store 总榜前十
item.guid: 蚂蚁集团全模态-AI-助手「灵光」三天冲上-App-Store-总榜前十
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Group disclosed that the application's downloads exceeded 200,000 on its launch day, accumulated over 500,000 downloads in just over two days, and climbed to seventh place on the App Store's overall chart on the third day, while also ranking first in the App Store's free tools category. "Lingguang" was released on November 18, positioned as a full-modal general AI assistant. 昨天，蚂蚁集团披露，该应用在上线首日下载量突破 20 万，两天多累计下载量超过 50 万，并在第三天冲上 App Store 总榜第七，同时位居 App Store 免费工具榜第一。「灵光」于 11 月 18 日发布，定位为全模态通用 AI 助手。

The core highlight of "Lingguang" lies in its groundbreaking achievement of "natural language generating small applications in 30 seconds" on mobile devices. Users can not only quickly generate but also edit, interact with, and share them, allowing ordinary users to easily "hand-craft applications." 「灵光」的核心亮点在于其开创性地实现了移动端「自然语言 30 秒生成小应用」，用户不仅可以快速生成，还能进行编辑、交互与分享，让普通用户也能轻松「手搓应用」。

Furthermore, "Lingguang" is the industry's first AI assistant that generates full-modal content entirely through code, supporting full-modal information output and visual interaction for 3D, audio/video, charts, animations, maps, and more, presenting an experience with great informational aesthetics. 此外，「灵光」是业内首个全代码生成多模态内容的 AI 助手，支持 3D、音视频、图表、动画、地图等全模态信息输出与可视化互动，呈现出极具信息美感的体验。

item.title: 智元远征 A2 人形机器人完成百公里跨省行走，获吉尼斯认证
item.guid: 智元远征-A2-人形机器人完成百公里跨省行走，获吉尼斯认证
item.description:
Recently, Zhuyuan Expedition A2 successfully completed the world's first humanoid robot 100-kilometer inter-provincial walking challenge, traveling 106.286 kilometers from Suzhou Jinji Lake to Shanghai Bund, and was certified by Guinness World Records as the holder of the "farthest distance walked by a humanoid robot" record. At the certification ceremony, a Guinness World Records official presented the certificate on-site, confirming the validity of the achievement. 近日，智元远征 A2 成功完成全球首次人形机器人百公里跨省行走挑战，从苏州金鸡湖至上海外滩，全程 106.286 公里，并获得吉尼斯世界纪录认证，成为「人形机器人行走最远距离」纪录保持者。认证仪式上，吉尼斯世界纪录认证官现场颁发证书，确认该成绩有效。

Hu Xiaowen, a Guinness World Records official, pointed out that the challenge process was tracked by GPS instruments and supervised throughout by professional witnesses and five third-party supervisors. 吉尼斯世界纪录认证官胡晓雯指出，此次挑战过程由 GPS 仪器记录轨迹，并由专业见证人及 5 位第三方监督员全程监督。

The challenge lasted from the night of November 10 to the morning of November 13, with the result finally confirmed as valid on November 14. She stated that this record was set on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Guinness World Records, showcasing the cutting-edge scientific and technological achievements of "Chinese power." 挑战自 11 月 10 日夜间持续至 13 日清晨，最终于 11 月 14 日确认成绩有效。她表示，这一纪录诞生于吉尼斯世界纪录创立 70 周年之际，展现了「中国力量」的前沿科技成果。

According to reports, Expedition A2 uses a mass-produced commercial model without customized modifications, and the laboratory has accumulated over 3500 hours of reliability testing. During the challenge, the robot was equipped with dual GPS modules, lidar, and an infrared depth camera to achieve precise navigation in both day and night environments. 据介绍，远征 A2 使用量产商用版本机型，未进行定制化改装，实验室已累计超过 3500 小时可靠性测试。挑战过程中，机器人搭载双 GPS 模块、激光雷达及红外深度相机，实现昼夜环境下的精准导航。

The Expedition A2 challenge started from Suzhou landmark "Gate of the Orient", passing through diverse sections such as urban areas, scenic spots, national roads, and provincial roads. Facing complex environments like asphalt roads, tactile paving, slopes, and insufficient night lighting, the robot fully complied with traffic rules and finally arrived at the Bund in Shanghai. 远征 A2 挑战自苏州地标「东方之门」出发，途经市区、景区、国道、省道等多样路段，面对柏油路、盲道、坡道及夜间照明不足等复杂环境，机器人全程遵守交通规则，最终抵达上海外滩。

Wang Chuang, Senior Vice President of Zhiman Robotics, stated that this inter-provincial journey demonstrated the maturity of humanoid robots in terms of hardware performance, balancing algorithms, and durability, laying the foundation for large-scale commercialization. 智元机器人高级副总裁王闯表示，此次跨省行走展示了人形机器人在硬件性能、平衡算法与耐久性方面的成熟度，为大规模商用奠定基础。

item.title: 高通：骁龙 X2 Elite 兼容 90% Windows 游戏
item.guid: 高通：骁龙-X2-Elite-兼容-90%-Windows-游戏
item.description:
According to VideoCardz, yesterday, Qualcomm detailed its next-generation GPU Adreno X2, integrated into its X2 Elite PC platform, at the Snapdragon Architecture Deep Dive 2025 conference. 据 VideoCardz 报道，昨天，高通在 Snapdragon Architecture Deep Dive 2025 大会上详细介绍了其 X2 Elite PC 平台所搭载的新一代 GPU Adreno X2。

Qualcomm stated that over 90% of popular Windows games can run on Arm-based laptops, with performance approximately 50% faster than Intel Core Ultra 2 series integrated graphics. 高通表示，超过 90% 的热门 Windows 游戏可在 Arm 架构笔记本上运行，且性能较英特尔酷睿 Ultra 2 系列核显快约 50%。

Official tests showed that in 3DMark Time Spy, performance increased by 70% compared to Adreno X1, power efficiency improved by 125%, and frame rates in AAA games could be up to 2.3 times higher. 官方测试显示，在 3DMark Time Spy 中，性能较 Adreno X1 提升 70%，能效提升 125%，在 AAA 游戏中帧率最高可达 2.3 倍。

In comparative tests, the Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme platform achieved an average frame rate approximately 50% higher than the Intel Core Ultra 9 288V system at 1080p medium settings, maintaining above 30 FPS in games like "Cyberpunk 2077", "Baldur's Gate 3", "Monster Hunter Wilds", and "Fortnite". Meanwhile, it showed a performance advantage of about 29% compared to the AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370. 在对比测试中，Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme 平台在 1080p 中等画质下，平均帧率较英特尔 Core Ultra 9 288V 系统高约 50%，并在《赛博朋克 2077》《博德之门 3》《怪物猎人 Wilds》《堡垒之夜》等游戏中保持在 30 FPS 以上。同时，相较 AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370，性能优势约为 29%。

Qualcomm also stated that several game anti-cheat systems have started offering Arm-native versions, including Epic Games Easy Anti-Cheat, Tencent ACE, Roblox, Denuvo, BattlEye, and others. The company claims it is taking multiple measures to address game compatibility issues. 高通还表示，已有多家游戏反作弊系统开始提供 Arm 原生版本，包括 Epic Games Easy Anti-Cheat、腾讯 ACE、Roblox、Denuvo、BattlEye 等。公司称，正在采取多项措施解决游戏兼容性问题。

Furthermore, Qualcomm Snapdragon officially announced the launch of "Snapdragon Control Panel" yesterday on X. It is understood that this application was rebranded from the original "Adreno Control Panel". 此外，高通骁龙官方昨天在 X 上发文，宣布「骁龙控制面板」正式推出。据悉，该应用系由原「Adreno 控制面板」更名而来。

Currently, the software is available on Qualcomm's official website, supporting Windows systems with ARM64 architecture. It integrates performance management, driver updates, and system monitoring functions, offering customized graphics settings and system optimization capabilities for developers, gamers, and advanced users. 目前，该软件已上线高通官网，支持 ARM64 架构的 Windows 系统，集成性能管理、驱动更新与系统监控功能，面向开发者、游戏玩家和高级用户，提供定制化的图形设置与系统优化能力。

Users can adjust parameters such as super resolution, frame rate cap, anti-aliasing, and texture filtering through the profile manager, similar to NVIDIA graphics card control panels. 用户可通过配置文件管理器调整超级分辨率、帧率上限、抗锯齿、纹理过滤等参数，功能类似于英伟达显卡的控制面板。

item.title: 机构：今年中国智能腕戴销量将创历史新高
item.guid: 机构：今年中国智能腕戴销量将创历史新高
item.description:
Yesterday, Runto Research published its latest report on China's smart wearable market. The report suggests that the size of China's smart wearable market will reach a new historical high in 2025. 昨天，Runto 洛图科技发表中国智能腕戴市场最新研报。研报认为，中国智能腕戴市场规模将在 2025 年迎来历史新高。

The report shows that total omnichannel sales in the first three quarters of 2025 reached 52.6 million units, a year-on-year increase of 23.2%, with full-year sales expected to exceed 71 million units. After a brief adjustment in 2022, the market maintained double-digit growth in 2023 and 2024, recovering to over 50 million units in 2024, approaching 60 million units. 研报显示，2025 年前三季度全渠道销量达到 5260 万台，同比增长 23.2%，全年预计突破 7100 万台。市场在经历 2022 年短暂调整后，于 2023、2024 连续保持两位数增长，并在 2024 年恢复至 5000 万台以上，逼近 6000 万台。

The report believes that smart wearables have transformed from "data recording tools" into "active health intervention devices." Functions such as blood oxygen monitoring, ECG electrocardiogram, hypertension management, and atrial fibrillation alerts are gradually being promoted, pushing the industry into a quasi-medical grade stage. 研报认为，智能腕戴已从「数据记录工具」转型为「主动健康干预设备」。血氧监测、ECG 心电图、高血压管理、房颤提示等功能逐步推广，推动行业进入准医疗级阶段。

Market segmentation has formed three major directions: 市场细分已形成三大方向：

  • Cardiovascular chronic disease management: Representative products include Huawei WATCH D series and Apple Watch Series 11, targeting urban middle-class and high-risk groups for chronic diseases; 心血管慢病管理：代表产品包括华为 WATCH D 系列与 Apple Watch Series 11，面向城市中产与慢病高风险人群；
  • Safety protection for key populations: Such as Xiaomi H1 and Little Genius Phone Watch Z11, focusing on elderly SOS, fall detection, and child positioning; 重点人群安全守护：如小米 H1 与小天才电话手表 Z11，聚焦老人 SOS、跌倒检测与儿童定位；
  • Professional sports and rehabilitation training: Such as Garmin Fenix 7 and Keep B5, providing high-precision GPS and VO2 max data for sports enthusiasts. 专业运动与康复训练：如佳明 Fenix 7 与 Keep B5，为运动爱好者提供高精度 GPS 与最大摄氧量数据。

Runto Research analysts pointed out that in the future, the industry will accelerate medical certification and age-appropriate adaptation. Smart wearables are expected to upgrade from "consumer electronic accessories" to "core tools for integrated health and wellness." Companies need to promote Class II medical device certification, improve monitoring accuracy, optimize interaction logic on the product side, and strengthen remote positioning and emergency call functions to meet the needs of the elderly population. 洛图科技分析师指出，未来行业将加速医疗认证与适老化适配，智能腕戴有望从「消费电子配件」升级为「体卫融合核心工具」。企业需推动二类医疗器械认证，提升监测精度，并在产品端优化交互逻辑，强化远程定位与紧急呼救功能，以满足老年群体需求。

item.title: 梅赛德斯-AMG GT XX 概念车中国首秀，刷新 25 项世界纪录
item.guid: 梅赛德斯-AMG-GT-XX-概念车中国首秀，刷新-25-项世界纪录
item.description:
Yesterday, at the "2025 Mercedes-Benz XX Tech Innovation Day" held in Guangzhou, the AMG GT XX concept car made its China debut. 昨天，在广州举办的「2025 梅赛德斯-奔驰 XX 科技创新日」上，AMG GT XX 概念车完成中国首秀。

As a pioneering work of the AMG.EA platform, this model applies F1®-derived drive technology to a pure electric architecture for the first time, showcasing new possibilities for high performance in the electric era. 这款车型作为 AMG.EA 平台的前瞻之作，首次将源自 F1® 的驱动科技应用于纯电架构，展示了电动时代高性能的全新可能。

The GT XX concept car is equipped with innovative axial flux motors and direct cell cooling technology, with a peak power exceeding 1000 kilowatts (approximately 1360 horsepower) and a top speed of over 360 kilometers per hour. GT XX 概念车搭载创新的轴向磁通电机与电芯直冷技术，峰值功率超过 1000 千瓦（约 1360 马力），最高车速突破 360 公里/小时。

During extreme challenges at Italy's Nardò test track, the car continuously traveled over 40,075 kilometers at an average speed of 300 km/h, breaking 25 world records, including the longest distance covered by an electric vehicle in 24 hours. 在意大利纳多测试赛道的极限挑战中，该车以平均 300 公里/小时的速度连续行驶超过 40075 公里，刷新 25 项世界纪录，其中包括电动车 24 小时最长行驶里程纪录。

Regarding the battery system, the GT XX concept car adopts a new quaternary battery, an 800-volt high-voltage architecture, and an intelligent direct cooling system. A single cable achieved a measured peak charging power of 1041 kilowatts, adding approximately 400 kilometers of range in about 5 minutes. This achievement is considered a key breakthrough in bringing the recharging experience of high-performance electric vehicles closer to the convenience of fuel-powered cars. 电池系统方面，GT XX 概念车采用全新四元电池、800 伏高压架构与智能直接冷却系统，单根电缆实测峰值充电功率达到 1041 千瓦，约 5 分钟即可增加 400 公里续航。这一成果被视为推动高性能电动车补能体验接近燃油车便利性的关键突破。

In addition to the powertrain, the GT XX concept car also introduces advanced technologies such as aerodynamics, human-vehicle interaction, and innovative materials. Features like the world's first variable-vane aerodynamic wheels, plasma actuator wake control, and racing helmets with integrated AR functionality all highlight AMG's redefinition of driving pleasure. 除动力系统外，GT XX 概念车还引入空气动力学、人车交互与创新材料等前瞻技术。如全球首创的可变叶片空气动力学轮毂、等离子激励器尾流控制，以及集成 AR 功能的竞速头盔，均凸显 AMG 对驾驭乐趣的重新定义。

Mercedes-Benz stated that the core electric drive technology of the GT XX concept car will first be applied to the first mass-produced high-performance four-door sports car on the AMG.EA platform in 2026. 梅赛德斯-奔驰表示，GT XX 概念车的核心电驱技术将于 2026 年率先应用于 AMG.EA 平台的首款量产高性能四门跑车。

item.title: 华为乾崑携手东风汽车发布「奕境」品牌
item.guid: 华为乾崑携手东风汽车发布「奕境」品牌
item.description:
Yesterday, at the Huawei Qiankun Ecosystem Conference held in Guangzhou, the new brand "Yijing," jointly created by Dongfeng Motor and Huawei Qiankun, officially debuted. The brand was named and voted on by hundreds of users, becoming Dongfeng Motor's first deeply user co-created automotive brand. 昨天在广州举行的华为乾崑生态大会上，东风汽车与华为乾崑联合打造的全新品牌「奕境」正式亮相。该品牌由上百用户共同参与命名与票选，成为东风汽车首个深度用户共创的汽车品牌。

Dongfeng Motor and Huawei Qiankun will continue to deepen their cooperation in 2025: signing the "Intelligent Vehicle Strategic Cooperation Agreement" in January, expanding to core areas such as intelligent driving and HarmonyOS cockpit in May, and unveiling a joint innovation laboratory in September. The Yijing project is regarded as the highest embodiment of their technological integration. 东风汽车与华为乾崑在 2025 年持续推进合作：1 月签署《智能汽车战略合作协议》、5 月扩展至智能驾驶与鸿蒙座舱等核心领域、9 月揭牌联合创新实验室，奕境项目被视为双方技术集成度的最高体现。

In terms of safety, Yijing will be equipped with Huawei Qiankun's intelligent driving system, offering features such as "parking space to parking space 2.0" and integrated cruising and parking, along with new safety protections like driver incapacitation assistance and lateral negative obstacle detection. 安全方面，奕境将搭载华为乾崑智能驾驶系统，提供车位到车位 2.0、巡泊一体等功能，并新增驾驶员失能辅助、侧向负向障碍物检测等安全守护。

For a smart experience, Yijing will integrate Huawei Qiankun's intelligent driving and HarmonyOS smart cockpit to create an immersive mobile smart space. The co-creation mechanism will also continue, with the brand planning to continuously listen to user feedback through innovative channels to keep product iterations synchronized with user needs. 智慧体验上，奕境将融合华为乾崑智驾与鸿蒙智能座舱，打造沉浸式移动智慧空间。共创机制也将延续，品牌计划通过创新渠道持续倾听用户声音，使产品迭代与用户需求保持同步。

item.title: 💡 马斯克：未来工作将成为「可选项」，货币将「无关紧要」
item.guid: 💡-马斯克：未来工作将成为「可选项」，货币将「无关紧要」
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Tesla CEO Elon Musk stated at the US-Saudi Investment Forum that with the development of artificial intelligence and robotics, money will become "irrelevant" in the future. 据《商业内幕》报道，特斯拉 CEO 埃隆 · 马斯克在美沙投资论坛上表示，随着人工智能与机器人技术的发展，货币将在未来「无关紧要」。

He pointed out that AI and robots will make work an "optional" activity, and society may eventually enter a phase where it does not need to rely on traditional employment and currency. 他指出，AI 与机器人将使工作变成一个「可选项」，社会最终可能进入一个无需依赖传统就业和货币的阶段。

Musk shared the stage with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang at the forum, where he emphasized that future constraints would come from electricity and matter, not currency. 马斯克在论坛上与英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋同台，他强调未来的约束将来自电力与物质，而非货币。

He cited science fiction author Iain Banks' "Culture" series, believing these works offer a reference for a positive AI future. He further stated that work would become a choice of interest, like gardening or sports, rather than a necessity for survival. 他引用科幻作家 Iain Banks 的「文化」系列作品，认为这些作品提供了对积极 AI 未来的参考。 他进一步表示，工作将像园艺或运动一样，成为一种兴趣选择，而非生存必需。

Previously, Musk has repeatedly suggested that AI robots (such as Tesla's Optimus) could eliminate poverty. He emphasized at a shareholders' meeting that universal healthcare and poverty eradication could only be achieved through robots. 此前，马斯克多次提出 AI 机器人（如特斯拉擎天柱 Optimus）能够消除贫困。他在股东大会上强调，只有通过机器人才能实现全民医疗与消除贫困。

He even proposed the concept of "universal high income," believing that in an ideal scenario, everyone could obtain the products and services they need, but this process would be accompanied by "a great deal of trauma and shock." 他甚至提出「全民高收入」的概念，认为在理想情境下，任何人都能获得所需的产品与服务，但这一过程将伴随「大量的创伤与冲击」。

At the forum, Musk also interacted with Jensen Huang, mentioning Nvidia's earnings release and concluding with a joke about "money being irrelevant," after which the two clinked bottles, a scene full of symbolic meaning. 在论坛现场，马斯克还与黄仁勋互动，提及英伟达财报发布，并以「货币已无关紧要」的玩笑收尾，两人举瓶碰杯，场面颇具象征意味。

item.title: 30.98 万元起，新款享界 S9 发布，全新 MPV 曝光
item.guid: 30.98-万元起，新款享界-S9-发布，全新-MPV-曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, the new Luxeed S9 was officially launched. This model, jointly developed by Huawei and BAIC, offers both extended-range and pure electric power forms, totaling 4 models. 昨天，新款享界 S9 正式上市。该车型由华为与北汽联合打造，提供增程与纯电两种动力形式，共计 4 款车型。

The body dimensions are 5160 mm in length, 2005 mm in width, 1492 mm in height, with a wheelbase of 3050 mm, positioning it as a mid-to-large sedan. The new car has undergone comprehensive upgrades in intelligent driving and design: 车身尺寸为长 5160 毫米、宽 2005 毫米、高 1492 毫米，轴距 3050 毫米，定位为中大型轿车。新车在智能驾驶与设计方面进行了全面升级：

    Equipped with 36 high-precision sensors, it comes standard with 4 LiDAR units, including one 192-line LiDAR and three high-precision solid-state LiDARs;

    Forward-facing, it adds a 3-distributed millimeter-wave radar matrix and is equipped with external microphones;

    The entire series is based on the new-generation Turing platform, with standard air suspension and variable damping shock absorbers to enhance ride quality;

    The pure electric version is built on an 800V high-voltage platform, with a maximum motor power of 227 kW and a range exceeding 800 kilometers;

    The extended-range version is equipped with Huawei's Snow Owl intelligent extended-range system, with a CLTC comprehensive range exceeding 1300 kilometers;

    Equipped with Huawei Qiankun Smart Driving ADS 4 system, further enhancing assisted driving and active safety capabilities.

In terms of appearance, the new Luxeed S9 features a new "Universe Star" emblem, dazzling "Star River" headlights, intelligent electronic exterior rearview mirrors, and a full-width "Nebula" taillight cluster design, giving it an overall more futuristic and technological look. 外观方面，新款享界 S9 换装全新寰宇之星车标，采用璀璨星河大灯、智能电子外后视镜及星云贯穿式尾灯组设计，整体视觉更具科技感。

Regarding pricing, the new Luxeed S9 Extended-Range Max model starts at 309,800 yuan; the pure electric version starts at 329,800 yuan. 售价上，新款享界 S9 增程版 Max 车型的起售价为 30.98 万元；纯电版起售价为 32.98 万元。

In addition, Richard Yu also announced a forthcoming "One More Thing" at the press conference – a new MPV model, expected to be positioned in the high-end market. 此外，余承东还在发布会上宣布即将推出的「One More Thing」—— MPV 新车型，预计定位高端市场。

item.title: 30.98 万元起，小鹏 X9 超级增程发布
item.guid: 30.98-万元起，小鹏-X9-超级增程发布
item.description:
Yesterday, the Xpeng X9 Super Extended-Range model was officially launched, positioned as a luxury seven-seater SUV, with the Max version starting at 309,800 yuan, and the Ultra top-trim version priced at 329,800 yuan. 昨天，小鹏 X9 超级增程车型已于正式上市，定位豪华七座 SUV，Max 版起售价为 30.98 万元，Ultra 顶配版本价格为 32.98 万元。

The new model focuses on long range and intelligent features. Officially, its CLTC comprehensive range can reach 1602 km, pure electric range is 452 km, the range extender's intervention noise is as low as ≤0.5 dB, and energy consumption is 16.5 kWh/100 km. 新款车型主打长续航与智能化配置，官方宣称其 CLTC 综合续航里程可达 1602 km，纯电续航里程为 452 km，增程器介入噪音低至 ≤0.5 dB，能耗表现为 16.5 kWh/100 km。

The new car also emphasizes "class-leading" safety and comfort. The entire vehicle comes standard with 9 airbags, meets Chinese and European five-star safety design standards, and uses 2000 MPa hot gas expansion process tubes to enhance body strength. 新车在安全与舒适方面同样强调「同级领先」。全车标配 9 个安全气囊，满足中国及欧洲五星安全设计标准，并采用 2000 MPa 热气胀工艺膨胀管提升车身强度。

In terms of the cabin, it offers Nappa leather seats, zero-gravity mode, SPA-level massage functions, and an AI audio system with 27 HiFi-grade speakers. 座舱方面，提供 Nappa 真皮座椅、零重力模式、SPA 级按摩功能，以及 27 个 HiFi 级扬声器的 AI 音响系统。

For intelligent features, the Xpeng X9 is equipped with a Turing AI chip, boasting computing power up to 2250 TOPS, supporting full-scenario automatic parking and emergency avoidance functions. Additionally, the vehicle features 800V ultra-fast charging technology, allowing for power replenishment in just 10 minutes, and its maximum ground clearance can be extended to 185 mm to handle complex road conditions. 在智能化配置上，小鹏 X9 搭载图灵 AI 芯片，算力高达 2250 TOPS，支持全场景自动泊车与紧急避让功能。此外，车辆配备 800V 超快充技术，10 分钟即可补能，最大离地间隙可拓展至 185 mm，以应对复杂路况。

Consumers who pay a 5,000 yuan deposit before December 31, 2025, can enjoy limited-time launch benefits, including 20-inch "Star-Shine Floating" wheels, a cabin upgrade package, financial or points discounts, and lifetime free data, among other car purchase privileges. 在 2025 年 12 月 31 日前支付 5000 元定金的消费者可享限时上市权益，包括 20 英寸星耀悬浮轮毂、座舱升级套装、金融或积分优惠，以及终身免费流量等多项购车礼遇。

item.title: 56300 元，徕卡 Q3 Monochrom 发布，搭载 6000 万像素黑白传感器
item.guid: 56300-元，徕卡-Q3-Monochrom-发布，搭载-6000-万像素黑白传感器
item.description:
Last night, Leica officially released the second-generation black and white camera for its Q system, the "Q3 Monochrom." This model features a 60-megapixel dedicated black and white sensor as its core, focusing on pure black and white imaging performance. 昨晚，徕卡正式发布 Q 系统第二代黑白相机「Q3 Monochrom」，该机型以 6000 万像素专用黑白感光元件为核心，主打纯粹黑白影像表现。

    Equipped with a 60-megapixel BSI CMOS black and white sensor, supporting triple resolution technology;

    ISO sensitivity range covers ISO 100 to ISO 200000;

    Supports up to 8K black and white video recording;

    Features IP52 dust and splash resistance.

The exterior design continues the minimalist style of the Q series, with an all-black metal body and black leatherette covering, and engravings on the top plate filled in black or gray. Notably, the Q3 Monochrom's design removes the classic red Leica "dot logo." 外观设计延续 Q 系列极简风格，全黑金属机身与黑色皮革蒙皮，机顶刻字采用黑色或灰色填色。值得注意的是，Q3 Monochrom 在设计上移除了经典的红色徕卡「可乐标」。

Leica also simultaneously launched a variety of accessories, including a leather-covered wireless charging grip and a red filter. 徕卡还同步推出多款配件，包括覆皮无线充电手柄与红色滤镜等。

The official price of the Leica Q3 Monochrom is 56,300 yuan, and it is now available for sale on the official online store. 徕卡 Q3 Monochrom 官方售价为 56300 元，现已在官方商城上架开售。

item.title: 15.98 万元起，广汽丰田新威兰达正式上市
item.guid: 15.98-万元起，广汽丰田新威兰达正式上市
item.description:
Yesterday, the all-new generation Wildlander was officially launched. The official slogan is "ushering in the era of domain control for fuel vehicles," emphasizing intelligent experience and positioning it as a high-cost performance SUV under 200,000 yuan. 昨天，全新换代威兰达正式上市，官方打出「开启燃油车域控时代」的 slogan，强调智能化体验，定位 20 万元以内的高性价比 SUV。

It is reported that the new Wildlander is Toyota's first fuel vehicle to adopt a new electronic and electrical architecture, equipped with domain controllers and gigabit Ethernet. Coupled with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8155P chip, it achieves centralized computing power and OTA upgrade capabilities, pushing fuel vehicles into the "software-defined car" era. Other specifications are as follows: 据悉，全新威兰达是丰田首款采用全新电子电气架构的燃油车，搭载域控制器与千兆以太网，配合高通骁龙 8155P 芯片，实现算力集中与 OTA 升级能力，推动燃油车进入「软件定义汽车」时代。其他规格如下：

    First equipped with Toyota TSS 4.0 intelligent driving assistance system, the number of sensors has increased to 24, the front-facing camera pixel has been upgraded to 8.3 million, and the millimeter-wave radar detection range has been extended to 280 meters, covering 200+ intelligent driving scenarios;

    Equipped with a 15.6-inch central control screen, a 26.4-inch HUD head-up display system, and supports Harmony OS ecosystem collaboration, with 26 mainstream applications pre-installed. The self-developed large language model voice system supports four-zone wake-word-free interaction throughout the vehicle;

    Equipped with the fifth-generation intelligent hybrid dual-engine system, the 2.0L HEV has a fuel consumption as low as 4.59L per 100 kilometers, and the 2.5L HEV has a fuel consumption as low as 4.91L per 100 kilometers;

    The E-FOUR electronic four-wheel drive system can intelligently adjust the front and rear axle driving force from 100:0 to 20:80.

This new generation model adds a 2.0L hybrid version, bringing the price of mid-size hybrid SUVs into the 200,000 yuan range for the first time, emphasizing "high configuration from the start, with the entry-level being the luxury version." Specific prices are as follows: 此次换代车型新增 2.0L 混动版本，将中型 SUV 混动价格首次拉入 20 万元区间，主打「起步即高配，入门版就是豪华版」。具体售价如下：

    2.0L Gasoline Entry-level Version: 159,800 yuan

    2.0L Hybrid Entry-level Version: 169,800 yuan

    2.5L Hybrid Four-wheel Drive Entry-level Version: 202,800 yuan

item.title: 荣耀 500 官宣搭载 8000mAh 电池：可连刷 31 小时抖音
item.guid: 荣耀-500-官宣搭载-8000mAh-电池：可连刷-31-小时抖音
item.description:
Yesterday, Honor confirmed that the entire Honor 500 series will be equipped with an 8000mAh Qinghai Lake battery. Officially, it can achieve 31 hours of continuous Douyin scrolling or 12 hours of continuous "Honor of Kings" gaming, making its battery life performance among the best in its class. The new phone will be officially released on November 24th. 昨天，荣耀确认荣耀 500 系列全系配备 8000mAh 青海湖电池，官方称可实现抖音连刷 31 小时或《王者荣耀》连续游戏 12 小时，续航表现位居同档之最。新机将于 11 月 24 日正式发布。

According to online rumors, the Honor 500 series will also be fully equipped with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8-series flagship chips, making it the only model in its class to come standard with a Snapdragon 8-series chip. 据网传消息，荣耀 500 系列同时全系搭载高通骁龙 8 系旗舰芯片，成为同档位唯一标配骁龙 8 系的机型。

Among them, the Honor 500 standard version uses Snapdragon 8s Gen4, while the Pro version is equipped with Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition. Benchmark data shows that the Honor 500 achieved an AnTuTu score of 2,434,862, and the Honor 500 Pro reached 3,232,068. 其中，荣耀 500 标准版采用骁龙 8s Gen4，Pro 版则搭载骁龙 8 至尊版。跑分数据显示，荣耀 500 安兔兔成绩为 2434862 分，荣耀 500 Pro 达到 3232068 分。

In terms of exterior design, the new phone adopts a horizontal runway-style rear camera deco, an integrated cold-carved back panel, a flat-edge straight screen, and a large R-angle design, with an overall style similar to the iPhone Air. 在外观设计方面，新机采用横向跑道式后摄 Deco、一体冷雕背板、直边直屏及大 R 角方案，整体风格与 iPhone Air 相似。

item.title: 韩伯啸：vivo S50 系列全系标配 3D 超声波指纹识别
item.guid: 韩伯啸：vivo-S50-系列全系标配-3D-超声波指纹识别
item.description:
Yesterday, Vivo product manager Han Boxiao posted on Weibo that the entire Vivo S50 series of phones will come standard with second-generation 3D ultrasonic fingerprint recognition, enabling fast unlocking in both wet-hand and low-light environments. According to blogger "Digital Chat Station," the new phone is expected to be released in December. 昨天，vivo 产品经理韩伯啸在微博发文称，vivo S50 系列手机将全系标配第二代 3D 超声波指纹识别，在湿手、暗光环境下均可实现快速解锁。据博主「数码闲聊站」爆料，新机预计在 12 月发布。

Previously disclosed official information shows that the Vivo S50 series will also fully support IP69 + IP68 water resistance. Additionally, the S50 Pro mini will be equipped with the Qualcomm fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 mobile platform, combined with LPDDR5X and UFS4.1, achieving a benchmark score of over 3 million at normal room temperature. 官方此前披露的信息显示，vivo S50 系列还将全系支持 IP69 + IP68 级防水。此外，S50 Pro mini 将搭载高通第五代骁龙 8 移动平台，结合 LPDDR5X 与 UFS4.1，在普通室温下跑分超过 300 万。

Furthermore, blogger "Digital Chat Station" also stated that the Vivo S50 series will focus on a "3S-level flagship experience," featuring the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen5 chip, equipped with an IMX882 main camera-level periscope lens, and 3D ultrasonic fingerprint 2.0. 此外，博主「数码闲聊站」还表示，vivo S50 系列将主打「3S 级旗舰体验」，搭载最新骁龙 8 Gen5 芯片、配备 IMX882 主摄级潜望镜和 3D 超声波指纹 2.0。

item.title: 餐饮品牌集体摆摊推「惠民菜」
item.guid: 餐饮品牌集体摆摊推「惠民菜」
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, catering brands in many parts of the country have recently collectively taken to the streets to set up stalls and sell meals, becoming the latest phenomenon in the catering industry's exploration of new survival paths. 据界面新闻报道，全国多地餐饮品牌近期集体走上街头摆摊售餐，成为餐饮行业探索新生存路径的最新现象。

Since July this year, from Wuhan Hujin Restaurant and Guangzhou Bingsheng Pinwei, to Shanghai Yaoyue Tower and Heji Xiaocai, and then to Changsha Haozaotou, well-known regional restaurants have successively joined the "street stall army," launching "convenience dishes" and "affordable dishes" to attract consumers with a low-price strategy. 自今年 7 月以来，从武汉湖锦酒楼、广州炳胜品味，到上海耀粤楼、和记小菜，再到长沙好灶头，区域知名餐厅纷纷加入「摆摊大军」，推出「便民菜」「惠民菜」，以平价策略吸引消费者。

Data shows that stall dishes cover main courses such as braised pork, spicy chicken, preserved vegetable with pork belly, and sweet and sour pork ribs, as well as braised dishes, snacks, and soups, with some stalls offering up to 70 different dishes. 数据显示，摊位菜品覆盖红烧肉、辣子鸡、梅菜扣肉、糖醋排骨等主菜，以及卤味、小吃和汤品，部分摊位菜品数量多达 70 种。

In terms of price, stall dishes are generally priced lower than dine-in options, with most stir-fries in the 10-30 yuan range, vegetarian dishes under 10 yuan, and meat dishes between 15-30 yuan. 价格方面，摊位菜品定价整体低于堂食，多数炒菜在 10-30 元区间，素菜低于 10 元，荤菜在 15-30 元之间。

Operating hours are concentrated at noon and after 3 PM, precisely matching the needs of commuters and family grocery shopping. Some stalls can achieve a maximum daily income of 30,000 yuan, with most stabilizing around 10,000 yuan. 营业时间集中在午间及下午三点后，精准匹配下班人群与家庭采购需求。部分摊位单日收入最高可达 3 万元，多数稳定在 1 万元左右。

However, reports indicate that the bustling street stalls reflect the ongoing difficulties of the dine-in business. Data from the Hongcan Industry Research Institute shows that the proportion of consumers increasing their catering expenditure in 2024 is only 31.3%, a decrease of nearly 19 percentage points compared to 2023, and the per capita consumption of listed catering enterprises also shows a downward trend. 然而，报道指出，摆摊热闹背后折射出堂食业务的持续困境。红餐产业研究院数据显示，2024 年餐饮消费支出增加的消费者占比仅为 31.3%，较 2023 年下降近 19 个百分点、上市餐饮企业人均消费亦呈下滑趋势。

For example, Green Tea Restaurant's per capita spending dropped from 62.9 yuan to 56.2 yuan, and Laoxiangji's from 30.6 yuan to 28.2 yuan. Insufficient dine-in traffic leads to increased unit costs and compressed profit margins. 例如，绿茶餐厅从 62.9 元降至 56.2 元，老乡鸡从 30.6 元降至 28.2 元。堂食客流不足导致单位成本上升，利润空间被压缩。

Reports suggest that while the street stall model can bring cash flow and exposure, it is difficult to replace the core profitability of dine-in services. 报道认为，摆摊模式虽能带来现金流与曝光，但难以替代堂食的核心盈利能力。

Some consumers question whether the outdoor stall dishes "resemble pre-made meals" and find the price advantage not obvious. In the long run, brand value may be damaged by a negative cycle where "the more popular the stalls, the colder the dine-in." 部分消费者质疑外摆菜品「像预制菜」，且价格优势并不明显。长期来看，品牌价值可能因「摆摊越火、堂食越冷」的负向循环而受损。

item.title: ENGINEERED GARMENTS 携手 GU 打造复古军事风单品
item.guid: ENGINEERED-GARMENTS-携手-GU-打造复古军事风单品
item.description:
Recently, American vintage apparel brand ENGINEERED GARMENTS and GU announced the launch of their first collaborative collection, which will be available at selected GU stores starting December 5th. 近日，美式复古服装品牌 ENGINEERED GARMENTS 与 GU 宣布推出首个联名系列，并将于 12 月 5 日起在 GU 指定门店发售。

This collaboration is themed "Manhattanism," inspired by the culture and street scenes of 1970s New York, blending vintage and military elements, and presenting more interesting designs through re-deconstruction and recombination. 此次合作以「Manhattanism」为主题，灵感源自 1970 年代纽约的文化与街头景象，融合复古与军事元素，并通过重新拆解与组合呈现出更具趣味性的设计。

The collection includes five items, combining EG's iconic rugged aesthetic with enhanced everyday wearability, reflecting both parties' shared commitment to design craftsmanship and detail quality. 系列共包含五款单品，兼具 EG 标志性硬朗美学与更高的日常穿搭性，体现双方在设计工艺与细节品质上的共同坚持。

item.title: 爱彼迎携手奥运名将推出冬奥主题体验
item.guid: 爱彼迎携手奥运名将推出冬奥主题体验
item.description:
Recently, Airbnb announced a collaboration with 26 Olympic legends to launch "Airbnb Experiences" themed around the 2026 Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics and Paralympics. 近日，爱彼迎宣布携手 26 位奥运名将推出 2026 年米兰-科尔蒂纳冬奥会与冬残奥会主题「爱彼迎体验」项目。

It is reported that the athletes participating in this collaboration span 7 countries and 15 sports, having collectively won 67 Olympic medals. 据悉，此次合作的运动员横跨 7 个国家、15 个运动项目，共斩获 67 枚奥运奖牌。

Before, during, and after the games, they will lead participants to Bormio ski slopes, Milan sports venues, and the Cortina mountains, offering diverse experiences including figure skating, short track speed skating, and freestyle skiing. Participants can enjoy ice art with "Quad King of Figure Skating" Nathan Chen, or glide across the ice with Italian short track speed skating star Arianna Fontana. 他们将在赛前、赛中与赛后带领参与者走进博尔米奥雪道、米兰体育场馆以及科尔蒂纳山脉等地，提供包括花样滑冰、短道速滑和自由式滑雪在内的多样体验。参与者可与「花滑四周跳之王」陈巍一同欣赏冰上艺术，或与意大利短道速滑名将阿里安娜·方塔娜驰骋冰面。

Airbnb stated that this series of experiences is now open for booking on the platform. Travelers can not only participate in in-depth interactions with athletes but also find high-quality accommodations near the venues through the platform, further enhancing convenience during the events. 爱彼迎表示，该系列体验已在平台开放预订，旅行者不仅能参与运动员带来的深度互动，还能通过平台找到靠近赛场的优质房源，进一步提升赛事期间的住宿便利性。

item.title: 《狂野时代》明日上映，预售票房突破 7500 万
item.guid: 《狂野时代》明日上映，预售票房突破-7500-万
item.description:
Bi Gan's art film "A Wild Era" will be released nationwide on November 22nd and is currently in hot pre-sale, with box office revenue already exceeding 75 million. The film released its final trailer and group poster yesterday, further enhancing its cross-century narrative style and immersive sensory experience. 毕赣执导的艺术电影《狂野时代》将于 11 月 22 日在全国上映，目前正在火热预售中，票房已突破 7500 万。影片昨日发布终极预告与群像海报，进一步强化其跨越世纪的叙事风格与沉浸式感官体验。

The film stars Jackson Yee and Shu Qi, with Mark Chao as a special guest star and Li Gengxi in a special appearance. It won a Special Award in the main competition unit of the 78th Cannes Film Festival. The film's narrative centers on time reversal, starting from the last day of 1999, connecting five chapters of touch, smell, taste, hearing, and sight, constructing a "bewitched" person's century-spanning dream journey. 该片由易烊千玺、舒淇领衔主演，赵又廷特邀出演，李庚希特别出演，并在第 78 届戛纳电影节主竞赛单元荣获特别奖。影片叙事以时间倒流为核心，从 1999 年最后一天起始，串联触觉、嗅觉、味觉、听觉、视觉五个篇章，构建出「迷魂者」跨越一个世纪的幻梦旅程。

In the final trailer, Shu Qi's "the great other" and Jackson Yee's "bewitched" engage in their last conversation. The scenes cover multiple dimensions including a doomsday youth, a olfactory deception, father-son memories, and auditory interrogation, presenting a complex sensory narrative. 终极预告中，舒淇饰演的「大她者」与易烊千玺饰演的「迷魂者」展开最后一次对话，场景涵盖末日少年、嗅觉骗局、父子回忆以及听觉拷问等多重维度，呈现复杂的感官叙事。

item.title: 《我最特别的朋友》友情版预告发布
item.guid: 《我最特别的朋友》友情版预告发布
item.description:
Yesterday, the film "My Most Special Friend" released its friendship-themed trailer. Previously, it was officially announced that the film would be released nationwide in China on December 5, 2025. 昨天，电影《我最特别的朋友》发布友情版预告。此前，影片已官宣将于 2025 年 12 月 5 日在中国全国上映。

This trailer, with its warm and delicate brushstrokes, focuses on the intergenerational friendship between Old Zheng (played by Zhang Songwen) and Liangliang (played by Zeng Kelang), showcasing the process of two lonely souls drawing closer, preemptively releasing the film's healing theme. 此次预告以温暖细腻的笔触，聚焦老郑（张颂文饰）与亮亮（曾柯琅饰）的跨代友情，展现两位孤独灵魂彼此靠近的过程，提前释放影片的治愈主题。

"My Most Special Friend" portrays the kindness between people with a warm touch. Zhang Songwen interprets Lao Zheng's journey from loneliness to acceptance through subtle changes in expression, while Zeng Kelang shows Liangliang's inner transformation with restrained performance. Their tacit interaction interprets the weight of an "alternative father-son-like friendship." 《我最特别的朋友》以温暖的笔触展现人与人之间的善意。张颂文通过细微神态变化演绎老郑从孤独到接纳的过程，曾柯琅则以克制表演展现亮亮的内心转变。两人默契的互动诠释出「如父如子般另类友情」的重量。

item.title: 《不过是上班》定档 2026 年 1 月 10 日
item.guid: 《不过是上班》定档-2026-年-1-月-10-日
item.description:
Recently, Liu Tong's new comedy "Just Work" officially announced its release date, set to hit theaters nationwide in China on January 10, 2026. 近日，刘同喜剧新作《不过是上班》官宣定档，将于 2026 年 1 月 10 日在中国全国上映。

The film delves into the theme of the workplace with an absurd comedy setting. The first released poster, presented as a "Workplace Evolution Guide," illustrates the entire process from workers waking up, commuting, to working overtime, metaphorically representing the repetition and oppression of modern workplaces. 影片以荒诞喜剧的设定切入职场主题，首次释出的定档海报以「职场进化图鉴」形式呈现，从打工人起床、通勤到加班的全过程，隐喻现代职场的重复与压迫。

Liu Tong continues his "dare to think, dare to act" and "truly insightful" style in his creation. The film is not just a comedy but also aims to be a collective healing for workers. Through the protagonist's time loop setting, the story reveals young people's resonance with and reflection on "workplace aversion." 刘同在创作中延续其「敢想敢做」「真实洞察人心」的风格，影片不仅是喜剧，更意在成为打工人的集体疗愈。故事通过主人公陷入时间循环的设定，展现年轻人对「厌恶职场」的共鸣与反思。
